document_data.caption: A map showing the Gaol of Lost Souls (labeled #14) in north Luthcheq.
document_data.name: Gaol of Lost Souls
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gaol of Lost Souls''' was an [[inn]] located in the capital city of [[Luthcheq]] in [[Chessenta]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|4420 Luthcheq}}
document_data.Location: The inn was located in north Luthcheq a short distance from the shore of the [[Bay of Chessenta]]. It sat across the street from a moneychanging business.
